forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 61F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 61F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 48F. N winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 21C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 69F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 69F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 68F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 68F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 52F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
